00023 using System;
00024 using System.Runtime.InteropServices;
00025 
00026 namespace ZBar
00027 {
00031     public sealed class ZBarException : Exception
00032     {
00036         private const int verbosity = 10;
00037         
00041         private string message;
00042         
00046         private ZBarError code;
00047         
00048         internal ZBarException(IntPtr obj){
00049             this.code = (ZBarError)_zbar_get_error_code(obj);
00050             this.message = Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(_zbar_error_string(obj, verbosity));
00051         }
00052         
00056         public override string Message {
00057             get {
00058                 return this.message;
00059             }
00060         }
00061         
00065         public ZBarError ErrorCode{
00066             get{
00067                 return this.code;
00068             }
00069         }
00070         
00071         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00072         private static extern IntPtr _zbar_error_string(IntPtr obj, int verbosity);
00073         
00074         [DllImport("libzbar")]
00075         private static extern int _zbar_get_error_code(IntPtr obj);
00076     }
00077     
00084     public enum ZBarError{
00088         Ok = 0,
00089         
00093         OutOfMemory,
00094         
00098         InternalLibraryError,
00099         
00103         Unsupported,
00104         
00108         InvalidRequest,
00109         
00113         SystemError,
00114         
00118         LockingError,
00119         
00123         AllResourcesBusyError,
00124         
00128         X11DisplayError,
00129         
00133         X11ProtocolError,
00134         
00138         OutputWindowClosed,
00139         
00143         WindowsAPIError
00144     }
00145 }
